textClass.keywords: <<<<<<< HEAD Cagely ======= Cagely >>>>>>> master Cranch, William, 1769-1855 Hunter, Alexander Lee, Cassius F. Moore, Alexander Slye, Thomas

org.orgName: United States. Circuit Court (District of Columbia)

div2.p:
The United States of America,
To the Marshal of the District of Coumbia, Greeting:

We command you, that you summon Alexander Moore, Thomas Slye, Mrs Cagely to appear before the Honorable the Judges of the Circuit Court of the District of Columbia for the County of Alexandria, at the Court-House in the Town of Alexandria, on the third day of next Court, which commences on the first Monday in May to testify and the truth to say, on behalf of Rachel Graham & Francis Swann in a certain matter of controversy, in our said Court depending and undetermined, between said Graham and Swann and this they shall in no wise omit, under the penalty of $333 33 cents.—And have then there this writ.
Witness William Cranch, Esq. Chief Judge of our said Court, this 30 day of April in the year of our Lord 1842

Alex: Moore sd
Th: Slye sd (Geo: Town)
Mrs Cagely Sd (W City)
Summd both & both say they cannot attend Mr Slye is sick in bed
A Hunter
Marshal
